wordGroup: independently of 独立于…之外；与…无关

sentences.en: It was the first time that she had lived independently.
sentences.cn: 那是她第一次独立生活。

sentences.en: Now I want to start doing tutoring work independently.
sentences.cn: 现在我想开始独立做辅导工作。

sentences.en: Camping out enables children to solve problems independently.
sentences.cn: 露营让孩子们具备独立解决问题的能力。
